title: Report: Apple, Spotify, and others cave to new Russian law that could impact censorship demands
content:
Amid the crisis in Eastern Europe, a report by New York Times indicates that Russia is intensifying a censorship campaign by pressuring tech giants, such as Apple, Google, Spotify, Twitter, and others into complying with a new law.

moreâ€¦

The post Report: Apple, Spotify, and others cave to new Russian law that could impact censorship demands appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A report indicates that Russia is intensifying a censorship campaign by pressuring tech giants, such as Apple, to comply with a new law.
